meanings.definition: People who watch movies in a theater.
meanings.sent1: The moviegoers eagerly awaited the start of the film.
meanings.sent2: On weekends, many moviegoers flock to the cinema for entertainment.
meanings.sent3: The moviegoers chuckled at the comedy on the big screen.
meanings.sent4: The moviegoers were like bees buzzing around the theater.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes of the moviegoers brightened up the cinema.

meanings.sent1: Moviegoers enjoy the experience of watching films on the big screen.
meanings.sent2: The moviegoers settled into their seats as the lights dimmed.
meanings.sent3: The moviegoers were thrilled to catch the latest blockbuster.
meanings.sent4: The moviegoers were a sea of faces in the theater.
meanings.sent5: The excited chatter of the moviegoers filled the cinema lobby.
